survey_name: Corporate Video Conference Tool Adoption Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction and effectiveness with current corporate video conferencing tools to identify areas for improvement and potential alternatives.

questions.question_text: Which video conferencing tool do you primarily use for work-related meetings?
questions.client_notes: Ensure 'Other' option includes a text field for specification. Consider randomizing option order to avoid bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons with 'Other' triggering a text input.

script.question_text: Which video conferencing tool do you primarily use for work-related meetings?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your primary video conferencing tool?
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced 5-point Likert scale. Include a 'Not applicable' option if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons displayed horizontally.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your primary video conferencing tool?

questions.question_text: What features do you value most in a video conferencing tool? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Randomize option order to prevent primacy bias. Clearly indicate selection limit.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with maximum 3 selections allowed.

script.question_text: What features do you value most in a video conferencing tool? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How many hours per week do you typically spend in video conferences?
questions.client_notes: Use clear, non-overlapping ranges. Consider your audience's typical usage patterns.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons displayed vertically.

script.question_text: How many hours per week do you typically spend in video conferences?

questions.question_text: What challenges do you frequently encounter with your current video conferencing tool?
questions.routing_logic: Shows if Q2 answer is 'Somewhat dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied'
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections as users may face multiple challenges.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with 'Other' triggering a text input.

script.question_text: What challenges do you frequently encounter with your current video conferencing tool?
script.routing_logic: Shows if Q2 answer is 'Somewhat dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied'

questions.question_text: How important is end-to-end encryption for your video conferencing needs?
questions.client_notes: Include a brief explanation of end-to-end encryption if the audience might not be technical.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons with a 'Don't know' option if needed.

script.question_text: How important is end-to-end encryption for your video conferencing needs?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your current video conferencing tool to colleagues in other organizations?
questions.client_notes: This is a standard Net Promoter Score (NPS) type question. Consider following up with open-ended Q8.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons displayed horizontally.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your current video conferencing tool to colleagues in other organizations?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason for your recommendation (or lack thereof) of your current video conferencing tool?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open text input with character limit of 500.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason for your recommendation (or lack thereof) of your current video conferencing tool?

questions.question_text: Which additional features would you like to see in your ideal video conferencing tool?
questions.client_notes: Leave this open-ended to discover unmet needs. Consider categorizing responses later.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open text input with character limit of 300.

script.question_text: Which additional features would you like to see in your ideal video conferencing tool?

questions.question_text: How does your organization currently handle hybrid meetings (some attendees in-person, some remote)?
answer_options: We use specialized hybrid meeting technology
Remote participants join via standard video conferencing
We don't have a standard approach
questions.client_notes: Understand current hybrid meeting practices to inform future tool needs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons with 'Other' triggering a text input.

script.question_text: How does your organization currently handle hybrid meetings (some attendees in-person, some remote)?
answer_options: We use specialized hybrid meeting technology
Remote participants join via standard video conferencing
We don't have a standard approach
